review_title: I love working at Brooke Grove
job_title: Administrative in Sandy Spring, MD
pros:
If you take initiative and ask for more responsibilities, there is a LOT of room for professional and personal growth at this organization

There is a scholarship program, which has allowed me to further my education - The Carl and Sue Howe Scholarship Fund

The campus is beautiful - 220 acres  half a mile away from the main road

Friendly staff members and a sense of community - there has been a yoga instructor, meditation specialist, zumba instructor, etc on staff who have offered free classes on campus to staff members after work/during lunchtime

Management is very caring/understanding toward staff members
cons:
The only downside about Brooke Grove is that I could  probably be making more money at another company... However,  the personal and emotional benefits of working here make up for the lack of pay.  There is not a single day that I have dreaded coming into work, and I genuinely feel like I have peace of mind working here. 
Also, I've seen management be VERY accommodating  to staff members who are in school (like me), who have families, and who are sick. I've found that its rare for an organization to care about staff like this, and to me this is priceless.

review_title: A beautiful campus populated by strong and compassionate individuals
job_title: Manager in Sandy Spring, MD
pros:
*The people who work at Brooke Grove are sensitive, compassionate and strong.  *The campus is a beautiful wooded and meadow environment that is inspiring and 
  uplifting.
*Retirement Plan with limited matching
*Tuition assistance
*Annual leave can be cashed out. 
*One unspoken benefit offered by this company is a staff Chaplain. This non-denominational Chaplain is available to every employee as well as every resident for confidential support and reflection, as well as team building and conflict resolution.
cons: Benefits include a minimum of paid holidays, and minimum paid leave.  Paid Time off is all one category - sick and annual leave.
